Name: National Trust of South Australia (The), Coromandel Valley and District Branch

About.Hours & facilities: Open by arrangement with Archivist. Reference assistance in person and by mail; copying of photographs and newspapers available.

About.Acquisition focus: Material relating to the history of the local area s-Coromandel Valley, Belair, Blackwood, Eden Hills, Hawthorndene, Bellevue Heights, Glenalta and Upper Sturt.

About.Major holdings: National Trust: photographs 1840- ; historical supplements to local paper 1970. Messenger Newspaper: clippings 1985- .

Contact.Street address: Ivor Symons Library, Main Road, Blackwood 5051
